ygData.subject: Re: The Man (?) Behind the Curtain
ygData.msgSnippet: I am a 37-year old full-time professional musician.  I m a trombonist currently playing a Jump Blues/Swing band out of Chicago called The Vanguard Aces I ve
ygData.messageBody:
I am a 37-year old full-time professional musician. I'm a trombonist
currently playing a Jump Blues/Swing band out of Chicago called "The
Vanguard Aces" I've also played Jazz, Blues, Salsa-Merengue, Reggae, and
theatre work. I used to work full-time as a computer programmer and part
time as a musician - but year ago - I was able to to switch that (I do
part-time consulting out of my home).

I was attracted to the Bard class due to the musical aspect and also I
do like being a JoaT..

Slyde of Xegony
aka Danny Sniderman of the Vanguard Aces
band website http://www.vanguardaces.com
personal website http://www.fuzzbone.com (not much there yet)
